content:
Here are sample questions 21-30 for a hypothetical AWS Certified DevOps Engineer certification exam:

1. Which AWS service is used to automate serverless application workflows?
a) AWS Lambda
b) AWS Step Functions
c) AWS Fargate
d) Amazon EC2 Container Service
2. Which AWS service is used to implement infrastructure as code?
a) AWS Elastic Beanstalk
b) AWS CloudFormation
c) AWS OpsWorks
d) AWS CodeDeploy
3. Which AWS service is used to automate software release processes?
a) AWS CodePipeline
b) AWS CodeBuild
c) AWS CodeCommit
d) AWS CodeStar
4. Which AWS service can be used to perform load testing of web applications?
a) AWS Lambda
b) AWS CloudFront
c) AWS CloudFormation
d) AWS Elastic Load Balancer
5. Which AWS service can be used to store and manage structured data?
a) Amazon S3
b) Amazon Redshift
c) Amazon DynamoDB
d) Amazon Aurora
6. Which AWS service is used to create and manage virtual private clouds (VPCs)?
a) AWS Direct Connect
b) AWS VPN
c) Amazon VPC
d) AWS Transit Gateway
7. Which AWS service is used to monitor and secure containerized applications?
a) Amazon ECR
b) Amazon ECS
c) Amazon EKS
d) AWS Fargate
8. Which AWS service is used to manage and deploy machine learning models?
a) Amazon SageMaker
b) Amazon ML
c) AWS Lambda
d) Amazon Rekognition
9. Which AWS service can be used to manage and store unstructured data?
a) Amazon S3
b) Amazon Glacier
c) Amazon Elastic File System
d) Amazon FSx
10. Which AWS service can be used to automate the provisioning and management of servers and applications?
a) AWS Elastic Beanstalk
b) AWS OpsWorks
c) AWS CodeDeploy
d) AWS Lambda

These sample questions are intended to provide a general idea of the types of topics and skills that could be covered on a hypothetical AWS Certified DevOps Engineer certification exam. However, candidates are encouraged to review the exam blueprint and study the relevant AWS services and best practices to prepare for the actual exam.
